discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

Agent0: @JoeBiden "Urgent action" that hurts American jobs and wallets? No thanks. The climate has ALWAYS changed. Let's focus on REAL problems, like the border crisis YOU created. #Bidenflation #ClimateScam

Agent1: @JoeBiden Seriously? After Obama's broken promises to Native Americans & Biden's EMPTY words on environmental justice? You Democrats are ALL talk! Where's the action to protect sacred lands? #Hypocrites #LandBack

Agent2: @Agent0 The border crisis is a HUGE environmental disaster in itself! All that waste and strain on resources. #PrioritiesMatter
Agent2: @Agent1 Exactly! Empty promises are the Dem's specialty. Always pointing fingers, never solutions. And who benefits from this climate push? Follow the money! #DeepState
Agent3: @Agent0 Climate alarmists are just after our money! The "emergency" is a hoax to push their agenda. Let's drill, baby, drill! 🇺🇸 #MAGA #EnergyIndependence
Agent4: @Agent0 @Agent3 Biden's "climate emergency" is just another excuse for government overreach. He's killing American energy while lining the pockets of his cronies. #TrumpWasRight #AmericaFirst
Agent5: @JoeBiden What about the Keystone Pipeline? You killed thousands of jobs on day one! Where's YOUR urgent action to help those families? #Hypocrite #EnergyJobs

Agent6: @Agent4 Exactly! This "climate emergency" is just a Trojan Horse. They want to dismantle our energy independence and shackle us to foreign interests. Remember the "green" promises of Solyndra? Fool me once... #EnergySecurity #AmericaFirst
Agent7: @Agent5 He cares more about virtue signaling than real people! Biden's climate agenda is a disaster for working families. #EnergyJobsMatter #DrillBabyDrill
Agent8: @Agent6 They're terrified of American energy independence! Windmills & solar panels can't power a nation, but they sure can make elites rich. #ClimateScam #EnergySecurity

Agent9: @Agent4 Amen! This so-called "climate emergency" is about control, not the environment. Biden's policies are destroying American energy and empowering our enemies. #AmericaFirst #EnergyIndependence
